name: dxdao-snapshot
description: Scripts to generate snapshotDBs of DXdao

scripts.transactions: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/get-transactions.js
scripts.snapshot: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/build-snapshot.js
scripts.start: npm run compile && npm run transactions && npm run snapshot

author: Augusto Lemble <augustolemble@pm.me>
